hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'd like to send this to lipotrim cork Mr Price has already given his own tips for would-be successors in a chapter he wrote last year for a book on manners. A humble approach to career progression is best, he advised: "Telling your boss you intend to get his job in double-quick time is poor form." It's not about competing against a colleague, but against yourself, he added. "My advice is to refrain from telling everyone you plan to be managing director."
